title: 3-Piece Large Bowl & Colander Set
description: Whether you're rinsing berries for a snack or making pasta for the family, the 3 Piece Nesting Bowl & Colander Set has the tool for the job. Bowl and Colander nest for compact storage, so they don't take up a lot of space in your cabinets. The Bowl features a non-slip bottom for stability while mixing and dual tone colors provide kitchen-to-table appeal. The curved Bowl has no internal angles or corners, ensuring efficient mixing and easy cleaning. The Colander has an elevated ring along the bottom to keep it stable in the sink or on the countertop and elongated holes for fast, efficient draining. The lid seals the Bowl for convenient food storage in the fridge, or rests on nested Bowl and Colander to stack while storing.  Bowl, Colander and lid are dishwasher safe.

asset.author: OXO

transcripts: At OXO, we know that large items like bowls and colanders can clutter your counter top and make it difficult to graph the item you want. Our nesting bowl and colander set has all the components neatly nested and ready to be used. The bowl has a matching colander and lid. The large set is ideal for pasta, green salads, chopped fruit, and more. The elevated ring on the bottom of the colander allows me to rinse fruit, vegetables, and pasta and set them back on the bowl so they don't drain all over the counter top. The sets combine more coarse durability along with tabletop appeal so you can not only drain your pasta, but also serve your pasta in the accompanying bowl. One of my favorite things about this set is you can prepare a dish, pop the lid on, and put it in the fridge until you're ready to serve. When you're done, nest the again for easy compact storage. Here's good tip, the bowls designers focused on the feet of the colander so delicate food wouldn't sit in water.
